elon_musk: Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, and X (formerly Twitter).
donald_trump: Donald Trump is the 45th President of the United States.
barack_obama: Barack Obama served as the 44th President of the United States.
dr_sunil_kumar_kn: Dr. Sunil Kumar is the Head of the ISE Dept and teaches DAA, Mini and Major Projects.
prof_amrutha: Prof. Amrutha is a teacher in the Information Science and Engineering (ISE) Department, handling subjects like Machine Learning.
prof_chethan: Prof. Chethan is a teacher in the Information Science and Engineering (ISE) Department, handling subjects like Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), Discrete Mathematical Structures (DMS), and Theory of Computation (TOC).
prof_manikanta: Prof. Manikanta is a teacher in the Information Science and Engineering (ISE) Department, handling subjects like Computer Networks (CN) and Full Stack Development (FSD).
prof_maria_naveen: Prof. Maria Naveen is a teacher in the Information Science and Engineering (ISE) Department, handling subjects like Operating Systems (OS) and Advanced Java Programming.
